caddy = *.tailnet.gnx
tailnet.1_@foo = host foo.tailnet.gnx
tailnet.1_handle = @foo
tailnet.1_handle.reverse_proxy = foo:8080

caddy = *.tailnet.gnx
tailnet.2_@bar = host bar.tailnet.gnx
tailnet.2_handle = @bar
tailnet.2_handle.reverse_proxy = bar:8080
----------
*.tailnet.gnx {
	@foo host foo.tailnet.gnx
	@bar host bar.tailnet.gnx
	handle @foo {
		reverse_proxy foo:8080
	}
	handle @bar {
		reverse_proxy bar:8080
	}
}
